recipesJson.name: Hazelnut Donut
recipesJson.author: MopHead
recipesJson.description:
Check out the video on this recipe here:  https://youtu.be/s1b-sL3Rm9g

Here is one I put a good amount of time into. It's a sweet and creamy hazelnut donut. At first I was having a hell of a time getting the hazelnut where I wanted it. I wanted it to feel integrated with the donut instead of sitting on the side. After some trial and error, I found that TFA peanut butter was my answer. This made something closer to a hazelnut butter that give this recipe a feeling of a donut with hazelnut butter filling. I really can't put this one down, going to be one of my ADV from now on.

reviews.text: This is a damn good donut. The peanut butter and hazelnut combination really make for a sweet and enticing profile. Zeppola drives it all home. Itâ€™s become my wake and vape and pairs really well with my morning coffee.
Fairly new to zeppola, mixed maybe 4 or 5 recipes with it.  This is the first one I've really liked.  My testing notes say simply, "Dunkin Stix"

This is really good. Ever since I've gotten zeppola I've been disappointed, felt it only fit a very specific profile. I mixed this about a week ago and let it steep so the pb and zeppola can calm down, this turned out to be something I'll definitely be mixing a lot of. Thank you for an awesome mix!
